SEARCH
Module JNewton
Package crab.newton

Class NewtonMesh

java.lang.Object
crab.newton.NewtonMesh
public class NewtonMesh extends Object
NewtonMesh relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • NewtonMesh refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment, SegmentScope.
Programs can only use NewtonMesh when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
